original_title: スワップ診察室 蜜しぶき
overview: The strategy of healing a demoralized husband with the pure love of a young wife! Kurumi, a married woman who cannot come to terms with her husband's illness, she goes to a sex clinic and does research day and night to rid her husband of impotence.
title: Swap Shinsatsushitsu: Mitsu-shibuki
